value:
$WmMPID_リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Normal,Face|*sigh* If only I had something
sweet to eat...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|If I am to believe what Dream-King
Freyr told us...now that we're awake,
$Nu should be...$k$pHm. I don't understand... Could the
nightmare have prevented us from
summoning the Summoner?$k$pOr...is it that reality has been
reshaped by my fear of having
lost $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Um... Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, sorry, Sharena... I was lost
in my own thoughts.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What were you thinking about?
Do you want to talk through it?
I'm happy to help however I can!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Sharena... It's just...$k$pWell, I know it might be hard to
believe, but...as we slept earlier, all
of us were in the land of dreams.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Do you just mean we were dreaming,
or...is it more than that?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|More. It was...real, somehow. And the
nightmares we faced in that world
seem to have followed us out...$k$pAnyway, that's what I was thinking.
I understand if it sounds like utter
nonsense to you...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Not at all! I've always believed the
land of dreams was real.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|R-really?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes! Ever since I was a child, in fact.$k$pIf even YOU are saying it exists, then
it MUST exist, Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Sharena... Your faith
means a lot to me right now.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It's only natural to trust your brother!
But if what you're saying is true, what
can we do?$k$pIf dreams really are affecting reality,
then anything is possible, right?$k$pBut thinking about it like that makes
me feel almost powerless...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You mustn't believe such things.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What? Why not?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The nightmares are born of our fears.
So, the obstacles we encounter are
pulled from our own imaginations.$k$p$EFace_Cool|That said, the rules that govern the
dream realm might also apply here
in reality...$k$pSo, if we can defeat our nightmares
within the dream world, we should
be able to in our reality as well.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wow, great thinking, Alfonse! If we
keep this up, WE'LL be the ones
making our dreams into reality!$k$p$Sbs150|
